Texts.Eng: When you're starving, you have some options. A ^orange;campfire^reset; cooks your meat. It's fast, but you'll need a bow, hunting spear, bone spear or hunting rifle to obtain the meat. ^orange;Get some^reset; and cook it. Then noms.
You could also take time to craft yourself a ^orange;hoe^reset; and set to work making a viable farm. It will feed you far more in the long-term without risking death.
